ko.title: 뒤쪽 우산 시스템
ko.description: 공이 진행 방향의 뒤쪽 쿠션군을 활용하는 우산 계열 시스템. 고정점 반복 계산을 통해 HP(타점)를 결정한다.

en.title: Backside Umbrella System
en.description: An umbrella-family system using backside cushion paths. The hit point (HP) is determined via fixed-point iteration.

formula_concept.note: This is a conceptual relation only. Actual computation is iterative and defined in derivations/backside_umbrella.rules.json.

hit_point.description: HP is not fixed and must be solved iteratively.
hit_point.note: Initial guess and convergence rules are defined in derivations.

spin.note: Spin direction and amount depend on angle region and exception rules.

system_characteristics: This system is derived from the 5&half family but uses reverse (backside) cushion geometry.
HP cannot be computed in a single step and requires convergence.
ssot_roles: systems/backside_umbrella/profile.json : identity, concept, UI text only
systems/backside_umbrella/logic.json : track selection and mode gating only
derivations/backside_umbrella.rules.json : all computation and iteration rules
